summary: The Protect America's Lands Act (H.R. 1309) seeks to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. It prohibits national securities exchanges from facilitating transactions in securities issued by "natural asset companies." These companies manage land for conservation, restoration, or sustainable practices, focusing on the value of natural assets and ecosystem services. The bill defines natural asset companies and outlines their intended activities.  The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 13, 2025.
